title: Watering Wisdom
fact: Check the top inch of soil before watering. If it's dry, it's time!
tip_content: Always check the soil moisture before watering your plants. Overwatering is a common issue. Ensure your pots have good drainage.

title: Sunlight Savvy
fact: Most houseplants prefer bright, indirect light. Avoid direct scorching sun.
tip_content: Understand the light needs of your specific plants. East-facing windows often provide good morning light, while south-facing windows can be intense.

title: Humidity Helpers
fact: Many tropical plants appreciate higher humidity levels.
tip_content: You can increase humidity by misting your plants, using a pebble tray with water, or placing a humidifier nearby, especially in dry environments.
